tool.name: GAIAC Bias Calculation
tool.description: Calculates Bias between the standard instrument and the sensors as per the US EPA recommendations

param.name: clm1
param.label: Select column containing data from instrument under test (sensors)

param.name: clm2
param.label: Select columns containing data from the standard or reference instrument

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool calculates bias between the reference instrument and the sensors as per the US EPA criteria
-----
**Inputs** Bias calculation * **--Infile** Input data frame as a tabular file. * **--c1** the column containing data from the instrument under test (sensors) select the column from the list. * **--c2** the column containing data from the standard or reference instrument select the column from the list.
-----
**Outputs** * Returns bias value between the standard instrument and the sensor data
